title: Steady state RC Circuit after a long time

content.question: A resistor and an initially uncharged capacitor are connected in series with a battery. A long time after the circuit is connected, which of the following is true?

choices.label: The voltage across the resistor is at its maximum.
The voltage across the capacitor is at its minimum.
The charge on the capacitor is at its minimum.
The current in the circuit is at its maximum.
The current in the circuit is zero.

content.answer: The current in the circuit is zero.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
